txt.en: 'The real reason I have come to this forsaken tunnel is to search for mithril along these dark, forgotten paths. Up where the glow-worms infest the mine-shaft, I believe there will be plenty of ore deposits to harvest. Will you bring me a sampling of what you collect?'

'Hello again, [placeholder]! Let us take a look, eh?'

Sori gently inspects each piece of ore you brought him, as carefully as Styrr did before him.

'Hm. No mithril that way. But perhaps in another spot nearby.'
The dwarves of the Silvertine Lodes mining expedition have a universal hunger for the discovery of mithril, or true-silver in the common tongue.
Harvested ore from a mineral deposit ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Harvest ore from deposits in the mine-shaft ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Ore deposits can be found in the glow-worm infested mine-shaft near Sori.\n\nYou should collect ore from the deposits so that Sori may assess the likelihood of mithril being found in this area.
Bring the ore samples to Sori
Sori is on a platform in the southern tunnels of the Silvertine Lodes.\n\nYou should return to Sori with the ore you collected.
